cp23:0.4_0: harming the domain of the house
cp23:1.1_0: “May the Brahmā realm be fully understood
cp23:10.1_0: A mother wouldn’t give me her life,
cp23:10.2_0: They don’t give me a Dhamma talk,
cp23:10.4_0: That’s why I should give up possessions.”
cp23:11.1_0: and third, take care of the house.
cp23:2.4_0: who have mastered this entire earth.’
cp23:3.1_0: They remember the noble ones by their voice,
cp23:3.2_0: selling aristocrats like an aristocrat of a brahmin.
cp23:3.3_0: one should walk keeping one’s arms steady,
cp23:5.4_0: like the moon in the waning fortnight.
cp23:6.2_0: after being conceived in his mother’s womb, and semen was emitted.
cp23:8.4_0: where I won’t fall under the sway of Death.’
